meanings.definition: A person who manages or looks after something, such as a household or organization.
meanings.sent1: The stewards of the school ensured all students were safe.
meanings.sent2: The stewards of the event made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The stewards of the picnic forgot to bring the food!
meanings.sent4: She was the steward of kindness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The stewards of the forest protected the wildlife from harm.

meanings.definition: To manage or supervise something, such as resources or finances.
meanings.sent1: He stewards the company's budget with great care.
meanings.sent2: She stewards the project to ensure it stays on track.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to steward the toy mouse, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: Time stewards our memories, preserving them for the future.
meanings.sent5: The gardener stewards the plants, helping them grow strong and healthy.
